sponsor: National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI)
briefTitle: Effectiveness of Etanercept for Idiopathic Pneumonia Syndrome Following Stem Cell Transplantation (BMT CTN 0403)
officialTitle: A Randomized Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Trial of Soluble Tumor Necrosis Factor Receptor: Enbrel (Etanercept) for the Treatment of Acute Idiopathic Pneumonia Syndrome Following Allogeneic Cell Transplantation (BMTCTN0403)
summary: The study is designed as a Phase III, multi-center randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial investigating the use of etanercept for the treatment of acute, non-infectious pulmonary dysfunction (IPS) occurring after allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplantation (HCT).
